reviews.review: Non Prime ist nicht zum Aushalten, ansonste sehr lustig
This game is so consistent and always reliable. I can come back to this game after months of not playing and still have fun with my friends. Much appreciate it :)
Good game, I just wish Valve would do more to improve their anti-cheat system.

Grâce à ce jeu, mes compétences de tir se sont beaucoup augmentées ! Depuis j'arrive à mettre des têtes très facilement. Bien sûr, ça n'est pas toujours facile car il faut échapper aux militaires qui me recherche etc etc, mais cela reste appréciable ces montées d'adrénalines. J'ai aussi appris à faire une prise d'otage et mes """employeurs""" prévoient de m'envoyer sur le terrain d'ici peu, coming soon ahah !

GOOD GAME WOWE ADDICTED AND WORST COMMUNITY NO RESPECT FOR PRO PLAYERS WORST MANAGEMENT


valve doesnt care about its community
Game mechanics are fun, community has the spectrum of rage quitters to fun teammates

Amazing game with plenty of depth and skill but still fun to mess around with. I have prime and although I personally haven't run into any cheaters, they do exist. the game is still amazing tho and I would recommend in a heartbeat

NO, NO and NO, absolutely NOT. It's full of cheaters on competitve or wingman. It is really unplayable. Also when you play without cheats like me and get in your team cheater, that game will be deranked and a loss of time. I don't understand why Valve after making so much money with this game, cannot implement a system like FaceiT ( an anti-cheat ) at least for the competitive side ( wingman including ). It's just a piss off around this game for competitve level. I'm selling my rig to get a console from now on. Thanks a lot! Peace

Командная игра построенная на том что игроки которые играют в нее должны быть как одно целое чтобы противостоять противнику. Твои тимейты должны помогать тебе, а ты им так ты достигнешь высшего ранга (глобал). Но на твоем пути могут попасться очень плохие игроки юзающие софт, читы и прочие проги
